name: Silksong Multiplayer
author: Extremelyd1
desc: Silksong Multiplayer allows people to host games and let others join them in their adventures.

name: Silksong Modlist
author: silksong_modding
desc: A modlist for Silksong. That's it!

name: Knight In Silksong
author: shownyoung
desc: Adds the Knight from Hollow Knight as a playable character in Silksong.

name: Silksong Debug Mod
author: hk_speedrunning
desc: The premier practice tool for Silksong, ported from Hollow Knight's DebugMod.

name: Silksong True Aim
author: Fabulator_K
desc: An aiming overlay for left stick input visualization and more. Customizable, animated, and supports eight localizations. Toggle with L3 (Controller left stick click or F8* on keyboard.

name: Architect Mod
author: cometcake575
desc: The Silksong level editor mod, easily make and share custom levels with an in-game level editor and level sharer.

name: Silksong Text Modder
author: dr1
desc: A mod that allows editing, overriding, and creation of new text items of Silksong's internal data. This can be used to change dialogue, names, tutorial text, menu items, etc.

name: Skong Gamemodes
desc: Library that allows you to make a new gamemode in a few lines of code.
author: skongdev

name: Silksong Data Manager
author: silksong_modding
desc: DataManager is a mod that saves and loads data - global as well as save slot-specific - on behalf of other mods.

name: MonoDetour
desc: HarmonyX interop & BepInEx 5 logger integration for MonoDetour. Initializes MonoDetour early as a side effect.
author: MonoDetour

name: Silksong Prepatcher
author: silksong_modding
desc: Prepatcher with general purpose assembly modifications.

name: Unity Helper
author: silksong_modding
desc: Library containing utility functions associated with Unity objects.

name: BepInEx Configuration Manager
author: jakobhellermann
desc: In-Game Plugin configuration manager for BepInEx
